short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save Web Pages to your library in Peech

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is official Peech Chrome Extension. Peech is leading text to speech solution available on iOS. This extension is designed to help users save web pages to their library so the page and its content becomes available in Peech application to be read / listened to.

Link to iOS app: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/peech-text-to-voice-reader/id1429704005
